translation.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction Event
translation.intro-desc1: , Please guess the price of Bitcoin at that time!
translation.intro-desc2: For those who guess the closest, we'll give you 100,000 KRW worth of Bitcoin. ðŸ˜„
translation.intro-desc2-warning: * The current price updates every 10 seconds but may differ slightly from the real-time BTC/KRW price on Upbit.
translation.event-detail2: ðŸ’â€â™‚ï¸ Calculation Criteria: Ranking will be determined based on the closest price prediction to the Upbit BTC/KRW price at 6/2 (Fri) 19:00 (KST)
translation.event-detail7: Winner Announcement: Sandbank website > Notice and email notification
translation.event-detail8: * Each individual can participate only once, and in case of multiple winners, the ranking will be determined based on the submission order.
translation.event-detail9: * Invalid if the on-site participation code does not match.
translation.event-warning-title: Consent for Collection and Use of Personal Information
translation.event-warning-detail1: The information will be used for the purpose of prize distribution and will be destroyed after the event ends.
translation.event-warning-detail3: Collection/Use Purpose: Confirmation of event participation and prize distribution
translation.event-warning-detail5: - You have the right to refuse consent for the collection/use of personal information mentioned above.
translation.event-warning-detail6: - However, if you refuse consent, it may limit your participation in the event.
translation.event-warning-detail7: I agree to the collection/use of personal information as described above.
